Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group/NumberBase.h.name: maxValue
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group/NumberBase.h.abstract: Returns the maximum value per digit, for the current base.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group/NumberBase.h.name: NumberBase
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group/NumberBase.h.abstract: This enumeration defines which number base the group will use.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.name: numberBase
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.abstract: This is the number base of the group.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.name: canShowNegative
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.abstract: True, if the group can show negative numbers. Cannot be true for only one digit (or no digit).

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.name: showLeadingZeroes
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.abstract: True, if the group can show leading zeroes. Cannot be true for only one digit (or no digit).

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.name: size
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.abstract: The overall size of the digit display. The individual digit sizes are calculated from this, including the spacing.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.name: value
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.abstract: The overall value of the digit group. This is clipped to the current setup (base, negative, and number of digits).

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.name: allOff
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.abstract: If true, then the value is ignored, and all segments of all digits are off. Default is off.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.name: allMinus
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.abstract: If true, and allOff is false, then the value is ignored, and digits are set to -1 (a bar through the middle).

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.name: idealWidthFrom(height:)
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.abstract: This returns the “ideal” width for this group, based on a fixed height.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.name: idealHeightFrom(width:)
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.abstract: This returns the “ideal” height for this group, based on a fixed width.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.name: outline
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.abstract: This is the outline of the entire display.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.name: onSegments
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.abstract: This is the combined paths for all the “On” segments.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.name: offSegments
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.abstract: This is the combined paths for all the “Off” segments.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.name: segmentMask
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html#/s:13LG.abstract: This is the combined paths for all the segments (both “on” and “off”).

Structs/LGV_7_Segment/Values.html.name: Values
Structs/LGV_7_Segment/Values.html.abstract: This enum allows us to use these as placeholders for -2 and -1.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.name: c_g_displaySize
Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.abstract: This is the size of the entire drawing area. The numbers are somewhat arbitrary, as the shapes will be cast into whatever context the user desires.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.name: size
Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.abstract: This is the display size. This is a mutable property.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.name: value
Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.abstract: The value that determines the display. This is a mutable property.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.name: onSegments
Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.abstract: This is the combined paths for all the “On” segments.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.name: offSegments
Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.abstract: This is the combined paths for all the “Off” segments.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.name: segmentMask
Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.abstract: This is the combined paths for all the segments (both “on” and “off”).

Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.name: outline
Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.abstract: This is the outline of the entire display.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.name: defaultAspect
Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.abstract: This returns the default aspect, as single floating-point value.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.name: currentAspect
Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html#/s:13LGV_7_Se.abstract: This returns the current aspect, as single floating-point value.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html.name: LGV_7_Segment
Structs/LGV_7_Segment.html.abstract: This struct is a graphical representation of a classic “7-segment” LED/LCD display for a single digit.

Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html.name: LGV_7_Segment_Group
Structs/LGV_7_Segment_Group.html.abstract: This struct aggregates one or more LGV_7_Segment structs, into a contiguous, multi-digit integer number.

Protocols/LGV_7_Segment_Protocol.html#/s.name: size
Protocols/LGV_7_Segment_Protocol.html#/s.abstract: This is the display size. This is a mutable property.

Protocols/LGV_7_Segment_Protocol.html#/s.name: value
Protocols/LGV_7_Segment_Protocol.html#/s.abstract: The value that determines the display. This is a mutable property.

Protocols/LGV_7_Segment_Protocol.html.name: LGV_7_Segment_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_7_Segment_Protocol.html.abstract: This just defines a couple of common properties.
